About

I began my professional accounting career in Canada in 1996. For the first 15 years, I have worked as a consultant, accountant and controller in a variety of different industries including construction, retails, auto, technologies, auction, transportation, and manufacturing.

Since 2011, I started my own practice offering public accounting services from basic book keeping to filing corporate tax returns. In addition, I provide management consultation to assist businesses with resolving business model issues, by providing detailed analysis to aid in creating recommendations to their business strategic plans.

As a CPA, I am continuing to sustain my professional competence by undertaking continuing education and professional development activities in accordance with the standards and policies established by the CPA Association. I put this as a top priority for me to ensure the quality of my performance is maintained at a high level for you to benefit from my trustable work.
